purpose: Reduce manual effort in security operations by automating the detection and analysis of new alerts
principle: Leverages machine learning models and rule-based systems to identify and analyze security threats
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with API support for integration into existing security infrastructure
limitations: Currently in alpha stage with limited coverage of threat types and potential false positives
name: diana
description: Save toil in security operations with: Detection & Intelligence Analysis for New Alerts (D.I.A.N.A. )
highlight: Automates detection and intelligence analysis to streamline security operations
